package.name: Databunch_Labels
package.summary: This extension enables the custom labels for your products. The lables are implemented as HTML/CSS not as images, which improves your site's loading speed. Our extension is entirely compatible with the new Responsive Theme.
package.description:
This extension enables the custom labels for your products. The lables are implemented as HTML/CSS not as images, which improves your site's loading speed. Our extension is entirely compatible with the new Responsive Theme.
Key options: - Three lable variants: "new", "sale", and "featured". "New" and "Sale" — use with standart rules of Magento, "Featured" — optional product attribute. - There are four placement options: top-left, top-right, bottom-left, bottom-right. - You can set your own color and the lable text. - You can set the minimal value for the "Sale" lable. - You can control the lables from the admin panel.
package.notes:
First release.
This extension enables the custom labels for your products. The lables are implemented as HTML/CSS not as images, which improves your site's loading speed. Our extension is entirely compatible with the new Responsive Theme.
Key options: - Three lable variants: "new", "sale", and "featured". "New" and "Sale" — use with standart rules of Magento, "Featured" — optional product attribute. - There are four placement options: top-left, top-right, bottom-left, bottom-right. - You can set your own color and the lable text. - You can set the minimal value for the "Sale" lable. - You can control the lables from the admin panel.
